#include <cstdlib>
#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t,i,sum;
    cin>>t;
    string str;
    while(t--)
    {
              cin>>str;
              for(i=0,sum=0;i<str.length();i++)
              sum+=str[i];
              sum=sum/i;
              cout<<(char)sum<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
